forgotPassword.title: Password recovery
forgotPassword.description: Choose the password recovery method that works for you
forgotPassword.usernameDescription: Send reset link via email using username
forgotPassword.viaPhone: Request teacher to send default password
forgotPassword.phoneDescription: Ask teacher to provide default password
forgotPassword.footerNote: Choose the method you can access most easily
forgotPassword.usernameNotFound: Username does not exist in the system!
forgotPassword.resetLinkSent: Password reset link has been sent successfully!

forgotPasswordSuccess.title: Reset Link Sent Successfully!
forgotPasswordSuccess.message: We have sent a password reset link to the email address associated with username "{{username}}". Please check your inbox and click the link to reset your password.
forgotPasswordSuccess.checkEmail: If you don't see the email, please check your spam folder. The reset link will expire after a certain time for security reasons.

forgotPasswordFailure.title: Failed to Send Email!
forgotPasswordFailure.message: We were unable to send the password reset email for username "{{username}}". Please check your username and try again.
forgotPasswordFailure.reasons: Possible reasons: Username not found, email not configured, or network error. Please contact your teacher if the problem persists.
